channel.title: Reduce KeepAlive values
channel.description:
Hey guys,
We spoke on Discord to reduce the time of the different gRPC keep alive properties than we use. I would like to have your feedback if we really want to change or not. Here are the differents values:
| Property | Default | Current | Proposed | |---|---|---|---| | `ServerParameters.Time` | 2h | 1 min | 1 min | | `EnforcementPolicy.MinTime` | 5 min | 5 min | 1 min | | `ClientParameters.Time` | Infinity | 5 min | 2 min |
Also, from https://forum.mesg.com/t/solution-summary-for-docker-dropping-connections-after-15-min/246, the values should respect: ``` ServerParameters.Time < Docker idle connection config (15 min) ClientParameters.Time > ServerParameters.Time ClientParameters.Time >= EnforcementPolicy.MinTime ```
Please vote in the following poll
[poll type=regular results=always public=true] * Keep current values * Change to proposed values [/poll]
